column4: Hi, I'm trying to look at how I can create an IRC server, using my websites hosting - so the server is in effect - irc.checkhookboxing.com but I've tried looking, however I'm not really sure on where to start still
Does anyone have any experience with this?
do you have root on that server?
if you have SSH access and your /home is allowed to run programs, you could try installing the IRC server in your homedir.
